### ITQ for North Head Wharf Electric Berthing Power Installation
#### Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) Solicitation
---

#### Project Overview

The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) has a requirement for the supply and installation of electric berthing power at the North Head Wharf in Grand Manan, New Brunswick. The successful contractor will be responsible for furnishing all necessary plant, labour, equipment, and materials to complete the work.

#### Project Details
- **Project Reference Number**: WS4263792340-Doc4263829740
- **Tender Publication Date**: October 17, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: November 1, 2023, at 14:00:00 local time
- **Expected Contract Duration**: 26 weeks
- **Estimated Contract Value**: Between $100,001 and $500,000

#### Key Requirements and Considerations

- **Eligibility**: Contractors must meet the eligibility criteria outlined in the tender documents.
- **Evaluation Methodology**: The lowest price will be used to evaluate and select the successful contractor.
- **Trade Agreements**: This project is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
- **Delivery Location**: The work will be performed at the North Head Wharf in Grand Manan, New Brunswick.

#### Contact Information
- **Contact Person**: Timothee Beausoleil, SPAC/PSPC
- **Contact Email**: [timothy.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:timothy.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17745823?extsite=MTc3NDU4MjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17745823?extsite=MTc3NDU4MjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg=)
